menuitem.label: Show current region
menuitem.help: Shows the extent and resolution of the computational region.

menuitem.label: Show region using latitude and longitude
menuitem.help: Shows the extent and resolution of the computational region.

menuitem.label: Show current region extent in Map Display
menuitem.help: Shows the extent of the computational region in Map Display.

menuitem.label: Set region
menuitem.help: Manages the boundary definitions for the geographic region.

menuitem.label: Set region
menuitem.help: Manages the boundary definitions for the geographic region.

menuitem.label: Display map projection
menuitem.help: Converts co-ordinate system descriptions (i.e. projection information) between various formats (including GRASS format).

menuitem.label: Manage projections
menuitem.help: Prints or modifies GRASS projection information files (in various co-ordinate system descriptions). Can also be used to create new GRASS locations.

menuitem.label: Convert coordinates
menuitem.help: Converts coordinates from one projection to another (cs2cs frontend).

menuitem.label: Set region
menuitem.help: Manages the boundary definitions for the geographic region.
